title: AI, EV are the future of Malaysia's automotive industry, says Zafrul

title: Education is dead, says director Ram Gopal Varma
description: Stating that the Artificial Intelligence (AI) wave will not wait for universities, ministers, or outdated boards to adapt, popular director Ram Gopal Varma has cautioned that it will simply erase what doesn’t evolve and that the first victims will be the students.

title: 71% of Indians use AI to guide work and career choices: Indeed 2025 report
description: A majority of Indian professionals now use artificial intelligence to validate ideas, solve problems, and even plan career moves. Indeed’s 2025 Workplace Trends Report shows that AI has surpassed pay and burnout as the biggest force shaping how India works.
content:
Artificial intelligence has quietly become the new colleague in Indian workplaces. From brainstorming ideas to making career decisions, employees are turning to AI not as a futuristic tool, but as a daily collaborator.
